title: Full-Stack Developer Intern
description:
**About Justera Group**
=======================


Justera Group AB is a leading Swedish IT consulting firm specializing in building high-performing technology teams and delivering end-to-end IT solutions. Led by dynamic female executives, Justera Group focuses on helping businesses harness the power of digital technologies to continuously evolve in today's rapidly changing economy.


The company has deep expertise in IT consultancy, software development, and recruitment services, providing clients with purpose-driven, well-trained consultants who consistently deliver efficient and effective results. Justera Group manages the entire talent lifecycle—from hiring to ongoing management—ensuring the right fit for each project on time and within budget.


With a strong commitment to quality, collaboration, and client success, Justera Group is a trusted partner for technology innovation across Sweden.

**About the Role**
------------------


We're looking for a **Full-Stack Developer Intern** who's passionate about building scalable web applications using modern technologies. You'll work across both frontend and backend components, contributing to APIs, user interfaces, and data management systems.


This internship offers the opportunity to collaborate with senior engineers on real-world SaaS systems built with microservice and micro-frontend architectures.

**Key Responsibilities**
------------------------

* Develop and maintain frontend components using React/Next.js
* ️ Build and optimize backend APIs using Node.js/NestJS or Python/FastAPI
* Work with PostgreSQL databases and ORM tools
* Integrate authentication and authorization using Logto
* ️ Consume and interact with cloud-hosted microservices
* Write unit and integration tests to ensure code quality
* Collaborate closely with DevOps for CI/CD and deployment workflows

**Tech Stack**
--------------

* **Frontend:** React, Next.js, TailwindCSS
* **Backend:** Node.js (NestJS) / Python (FastAPI)
* **Database:** PostgreSQL, Redis
* **Auth:** Logto/Auth0/Okta/Keycloak
* **Version Control:** Git, GitHub
* **CI/CD:** GitHub Actions, Docker

**Requirements**
----------------

* Pursuing or recently completed a degree in Computer Science or related field
* Knowledge of JavaScript/TypeScript and RESTful APIs
* ️ Understanding of databases (SQL basics) and version control (Git)
* Eagerness to learn microservices and modern web architectures
* Good communication skills and a collaborative mindset

**What You'll Gain**
--------------------

* Experience building production-ready SaaS applications
* Mentorship in full-stack and cloud-based development practices
* Hands-on exposure to real DevOps and CI/CD workflows
* Potential for full-time employment upon successful completion

**What We Offer**
-----------------

* A dynamic and innovative workplace driving advancements in cutting-edge technologies
* The opportunity to collaborate with talented cross-functional teams on meaningful and impactful projects
* A supportive culture that fosters continuous learning, growth, and professional development
* Flexible hybrid working model for an optimal work-life balance

**How to Apply**
----------------


Send your application including:

* Resume or GitHub/LinkedIn profile
* A short note about your full-stack interests or any project you've worked on

*Justera Group is committed to diversity and inclusion. We encourage applications from all qualified candidates.*

title: Frontend Utvecklare | Ving
description:
*Vill du vara med och bygga den digitala plattformen som gör det möjligt för Vings kunder att få den bästa upplevelsen när de bokar och reser ut i världen?*

### **Om rollen**


Ving söker nu en engagerad och leveransfokuserad webbutvecklare/apputvecklare till sitt utvecklingsteam i Stockholm.


Som utvecklare hos Ving arbetar du agilt i snabba releasecykler med continuous delivery. Teamen har sin egen variant av Scrum/Kanban och ansvarar för hela kedjan - från kravförståelse och utveckling till deploy, förvaltning och support.


Ving har en tydlig “Cloud first”-strategi, och erfarenhet av molnlösningar, särskilt inom Azure, värdesätts högt.


I denna roll blir du en del av teamet **Journey** - ett av Vings frontend-teamdär arbetet präglas av testdriven utveckling, högt tempo och starkt kvalitetstänk. Teamet utvecklar och underhåller Vings publika webbplatser och appar som står för nästan 100 % av alla bokningar, betalningar och den digitala upplevelsen före, under och efter resan.


Du kommer att arbeta med **komplexa systemlösningar** som används både i Norden och internationellt - och bidra till lösningar som gör verklig skillnad för hundratusentals resenärer.

### **Vem är du?**


Ving söker en nyfiken, noggrann och kommunikativ utvecklare som trivs i team och brinner för kodning. Du uppskattar samarbete, delar gärna kunskap och bidrar till en öppen och lärande kultur.


Du arbetar proaktivt, ser helheten och driver utvecklingen framåt. Ett intresse för DevOps, automatisering och CI/CD är meriterande, liksom erfarenhet av att samarbeta med både utvecklare och driftteam för att skapa effektiva och hållbara lösningar.

##### **Vi tror att du har:**

* Minst **5 års erfarenhet** av utveckling i **React**
* Erfarenhet av React Native, Node.js, GraphQL eller Azure
* Relevant högskole- eller universitetsutbildning
* Erfarenhet av agila arbetssätt (Scrum eller Kanban)
* Flytande svenska i tal och skrift
* En stark laganda och vilja att bidra till teamets framgång

##### **Meriterande:**

* Erfarenhet av testdriven utveckling (TDD)
* Erfarenhet av parprogrammering/mobbprogrammering
* Kunskap om tillgänglighetsdirektivet
* Intresse för AI och modern utvecklingsteknik
* Erfarenhet av DevOps och automatisering

### **Vings tekniska miljö**


Vings IT-avdelning består av 13 utvecklingsteam baserade i Stockholm.  

Webb- och apputvecklingen sker i **React** och **React Native**, medan interna system byggs i Microsoft-miljö med moderna tekniker som **.NET Core, C#, Node, Azure, JavaScript, MS SQL, Redis** och **Visual Studio**.

### **Varför Ving?**


Ving erbjuder en stimulerande arbetsmiljö där IT arbetar nära verksamheten och där du får vara med och utveckla lösningar som direkt påverkar kundernas upplevelse.


Som medarbetare får du:

* Goda utvecklingsmöjligheter och stöd från erfarna kollegor
* En varm, engagerad kultur med starkt medarbetarengagemang
* Flexibelt arbete - möjlighet till distansarbete upp till två dagar i veckan
* Förmåner som tjänstepension, friskvårdsbidrag och fritidsstudiebidrag
* En riktigt förmånlig rabatt på resor!


Ving är en arbetsplats där människor trivs, utvecklas och väljer att stanna länge - och där passionen för resor genomsyrar allt de gör.

#### **Praktisk information**


Tjänsten är en heltidstjänst placerad på Vings huvudkontor på Kungsholmen i Stockholm. Distansarbete upp till två dagar per vecka är möjligt när det passar teamet och arbetsuppgifterna.


Rekryteringsprocessen hanteras av **Senterprise** och består av följande steg:



* **Inledande digitalt samtal** med Senterprise, där vi tillsammans utforskar hur rollen matchar dina erfarenheter och drivkrafter.


* **Första intervju hos Ving** med rekryterande chef.


* **Teknisk intervju** med utvecklare från teamet.


* Personlighets- och logiktester, samt referenstagning inför slutligt beslut.



**Frågor om tjänsten?**


Kontakta gärna Erik Larsson på erik.larsson@senterprise.se.

**Senterprise**

*Senterprise är ett ledande tech-rekryteringsbolag med expertis inom rekrytering av erfarna systemutvecklare. Vi hjälper idag några av Sverige mest attraktiva arbetsgivare med rekrytering och konsulter.* *Läs mer på* *senterprise.se**.*

title: RPA-utvecklare inriktad mot intelligent automation
description:
Vill du vara en drivande kraft i att ta automationsområdet på Skatteverket till nästa nivå? Vi söker dig som vill ta nästa steg i karriären och vara med och forma framtidens automatiserade lösningar!

**Om jobbet**  

Skatteverkets it-avdelning är en av Sveriges största, med en stor och spännande it-miljö. Vi ansvarar för drift, förvaltning och utveckling av Skatteverkets- och våra kunders it-system. Vi erbjuder dig goda utvecklingsmöjligheter och en chans att utvecklas inom en bred och varierad it-miljö. Vi siktar högt och når goda resultat och det är en självklarhet för oss att du ska ha balans mellan arbete och fritid.


I rollen som utvecklare hos oss får du vara med från ax till limpa när nya automationer växer fram – från att stötta i behovsanalys och kravställning, till att utveckla, testa och förvalta tillämpningarna som teamet driftsätter. Ditt huvudsakliga verktyg blir utveckling i UiPath-plattformen, där du arbetar med att skapa smarta, skalbara och effektiva automationer. Du har djup kompetens inom processautomation och stor nyfikenhet på hur t ex AI-agenter kan användas i praktiken. Hos oss får du vara dig själv, växa i din roll och ha riktigt roligt på jobbet. Vi ser fram emot att välkomna en ny kollega som vill vara med och forma framtidens automationer – tillsammans med oss. Rollen kräver att du är självgående och du kommer alltid att ha ett kompetent och engagerat team vid din sida. Du ska trivas i hela utvecklingskedjan – från idé till förvaltning. Tillsammans driver vi utvecklingen framåt – alltid med fokus på nytta, kvalitet och samarbete.

Teamet består idag av sju personer som har rollerna produktägare, Scrum Master, processanalytiker och utvecklare. Vi är på en spännande resa och arbetar för att ta in flera AI-tekniker till vår automationsförmåga och här blir alla dina erfarenheter inom området ovärderliga. Runt hörnet väntar också AI-verkstaden för offentlig sektor där Skatteverket driver implementeringen.

**Om dig**


För att göra ett bra jobb och trivas hos oss på Skatteverket behöver du vara lyhörd, tänka nytt och ta ansvar. I arbetet är gott omdöme och förståelse för rättssäkerhet och säkerhet viktigt. Du ska också leva upp till vår medarbetarpolicy.


I det här jobbet ska du:

* ha god kommunikationsförmåga i tal och skrift
* ha förmåga att planera, organisera och dokumentera ditt arbete
* vara hjälpsam och bemöta andra med vänlighet och respekt
* vara utvecklingsorienterad och nytänkande
* kunna arbeta både självständigt samt bidra i teamet
* vara beredd att dela med dig av dina kunskaper och föra kunskap vidare
* kunna analysera informationsflöden, se samband, mönster och göra avgränsningar.


Du ska även ha:

* en relevant akademisk utbildning inom IT eller motsvarande erfarenhet vi bedömer likvärdig
* minst fem års aktuell erfarenhet av systemutveckling, gärna med fokus på RPA och helst i UiPath
* aktuell erfarenhet av versionshantering av kod i verktyg som t ex GITHUB
* arbetat med AI-tekniker, gärna IDP (Intelligent Document Processing), generativ AI eller AI-agenter

**Det är önskvärt om du har aktuell erfarenhet av:**

* Agilt arbetssätt
* Större RPA-initiativ i komplexa organisationer
* Programmeringsspråk som används i AI-sammanhang, t ex Python
* Systemutveckling utanför RPA-området, t ex byggt och förvaltat applikationer
* CI/CD (Continuous integration, continuous development)

**Bra att veta**  

Anställningen är tillsvidare och kan inledas med provanställning i sex månader.


En anställning hos oss kan innebära placering i säkerhetsklass. En säkerhetsprövning med registerkontroll enligt säkerhetsskyddslagen (2018:585) kan därför komma att genomföras före beslut om anställning. För en del av våra arbetsuppgifter i säkerhetsklass krävs svenskt medborgarskap.


På skatteverket.se/jobb kan du exempelvis läsa om vår samhällsbärande roll, fördelarna med att jobba hos oss och hur det går till när du söker våra jobb.


När du ansöker bifogar du ditt cv. Vi använder inte personligt brev i våra rekryteringar och du ska därför inte bifoga det i din ansökan.


Välkommen med din ansökan!


Skatteverket har en samhällsbärande roll. Vårt arbete berör alla privatpersoner och företag och genom vårt uppdrag bidrar vi till ett väl fungerande samhälle. Vår utveckling är kunddriven och vi samverkar med andra för att skapa effektiva lösningar. Tillsammans gör vi samhället möjligt.


Anställningsform: tillsvidareanställning | Anställningens omfattning: heltid | Antal lediga befattningar: 1 | Sysselsättningsgrad: 100% | Ort: Sundbyberg | Län: Stockholms län | Land: Sweden | Referensnummer: 2025/818 | Kontakt: Kenneth Wallin, sektionschef 010-5723619, Jesper Österberg, hr-specialist 010-5750245, | Facklig företrädare: Jeanette Forsgren, ST jeanette.forsgren@skatteverket.se, Göran Sundwall, Saco goran.sundwall@skatteverket.se, Therese Sjödin, Seko therese.sjodin@skatteverket.se, | Publicerat: 2025-10-10 | Sista ansökningsdag: 2025-10-27

title: Frontend Developer
company_industry: Software Development and IT System Design Services
description:
I am looking for
 *Swedish speaking* 
 Frontend developers in Stockholm to join a mid-sized company in the public sector. The ideal candidate will have strong expertise in React, TypeScript, and modern CSS practices, building accessible and scalable applications that make a real impact. Bonus points if you've worked with Turborepo, React Router 7, Azure Container Apps, or TailwindCSS.
 



  





 This is a really exciting time to join as the team are undergoing a major transformation project, modernising their IT systems and completely rebuilding their web applications. This means you have an amazing opportunity to make a genuine meaningful impact to the development and business.
 



  





**Key Responsiblities:** 




  




* Design, develop, and maintain high quality frontend applications for public-facing and internal applications
* Implement responsive and accessible UIs using React, TypeScript, and CSS.
* Collaborate with the C# backend and infrastructure teams to ensure seamless integrations.
* Contribute to the performance, scalability, and security of frontend applications.



  





**Requirements:** 




  




* 4+ years' experience working with
 **React** 
 and
 **TypeScript**
* Strong skills in
 **CSS** 
 (modern frameworks, responsive design, accessibility best practices)
* Experience with
 **Git**
* Understanding of frontend software development best practices
* Bonus: experience with
 **Turborepo, React Router 7, Azure Container Apps, or TailwindCSS.**



  





*This role requires candidates to speak fluent Swedish and unfortunately cannot assist with visa sponsorships.* 




  





**Why join?** 




  




* As a company in the public sector, you're input will massively contribute to Swedish social improvement and sustainability.
* Although this is a Swedish company, they are part of international communities offering the chance for global collaboration and conferences.
* The upcoming modernization and digitalization projects offer you the chance to make a real impact on the organisation and your career growth.
* Supportive, team-oriented culture with a focus on making a positive impact.



  





 For more information, please apply and I will be in touch.

title: Full Stack Developer – Intranet Development | SEB, Stockholm
description:
Are you a passionate Full Stack Developer looking to make an impact? Do you enjoy working with modern technologies to build and improve digital workplaces? We are looking for a skilled developer to join our team and take our intranet to the next level!
   

  

 SEB is more than just a bank with an IT function. We are a progressive tech company powered by innovation and fueled by collaboration. Together we're innovating for a sustainable society and building the tech arena of the future, a welcoming space for everyone. Are you ready to take on a new challenge? If so, you'll be interested in this opportunity!
   

  

**About The Role**
 As a Full Stack Developer, you will be responsible for developing, maintaining, and optimizing our intranet platform. You will work with a modern tech stack, focusing on both frontend and backend development, while collaborating closely with product owners, UX designers, and other agile teams. You’ll be part of a cross-functional team with highly skilled colleagues and play a key role in ensuring our services are secure, scalable, and high-performing.
   

  

**To Thrive In This Role, We Believe You Have**
* Previous experience in .NET Core and creating Single-Page Applications for the web.
* Design and implement APIs and integrations
* Write and maintain high-quality code with a focus on performance, security, and scalability
* Knowledge of writing unit and end-to-end tests based on requirements
* Collaboration skills that allow you to work as a team to understand business needs and translate them into technical solutions
* An academic degree or an equivalent qualification


**Optional Qualifications**
* Skills in Optimizely CMS and Angular
* Good knowledge in Docker, Microsoft Azure DevOps and GitHub
* Used test frameworks like Playwright, MSTest, and Jest
* Worked with databases to store and manage content efficiently


**What We Offer**
* Agile and modern ways of working
* Work with modern technologies in a dynamic and collaborative team
* Influence the future of our intranet and digital workplace
* A great work-life balance with flexible working arrangements


**Ready to take the next step on your career journey?**
 Welcome to our inclusive culture, where our shared values inspire and uplift our team. We celebrate diversity and strive to ensure every employee feels seen, heard, and valued.
   

  

 Attach your CV and a personal letter describing yourself and how you can contribute to the team. The last application date is 2025-10-24. If you have questions about the position, please contact hiring manager Linda Aronsson Steneros, Team Manager Public Websites and Intranet, SEB.
   

  

 Please be aware that our final candidates undergo background checks, a process that includes for example identity control, verification of qualifications, credit checks, company engagements and criminal records checks. In some cases, we also apply random drug checks.
   

  

 SEB Sweden has a redeployment responsibility, why this position might be covered by internal redeployment.
   

  

 Learn more about working at SEB here: www.sebgroup.com/techcareers
   

  

 It is our fundamental belief that inclusion and diversity is crucial for our future success. We strive to have an inclusive, value-driven culture where employees feel valued, respected and involved irrespective of who they are, what they believe or where they come from.

title: Founding Full-stack Engineer
description:
If you are a solid full-stack developer with experience from agentic systems, we would love to speak with you. We just raised from Lightspeed and are currently building out a world-class team.
 



  





 At Epiminds, we’re building a self-learning marketing team of 20+ autonomous agents working across data, creative, strategy, and execution — all led by Lucy, a super-agent who collaborates with human marketers like a real teammate: reaching out, listening, emailing, and even calling.¨
 



  





 Today, 17 agencies and 270 brands leverage our product to save 60 % of their time. We just raised a $6m round from Lightspeed to meet high demand from our users. Lightspeed has also invested in Anthropic, xAI, Mistral, and other decacorns.
 



  





 Right now, we are focused on continuously improving Lucy and her team. While also closing more deals with customers.
 



  





 Your role as a founding full-stack engineer will be to build on the systems around Lucy.
 



  





 Here’s some tasks that you will work on:
 


* Implement and maintain features across the full stack: frontend, backend and infra
* Own systems end-to-end: architecture, implementation, deployment, and iteration
* Collaborate closely with the founders and AI engineers to translate capabilities into intuitive, mind-blowing user experiences
* Drive the full development lifecycle, from technical planning to production launch and post-release improvements
* Contribute to shaping our technical direction, eng culture, and product strategy



  





 What we’re looking for
 


* 3+ years of experience building and shipping full-stack products
* Fluent in modern frontend (React/TypeScript) and backend development
* Solid understanding of systems design, performance tradeoffs, and scalable architecture
* Strong product sense and ability to make well-reasoned technical decisions, knowing when to prioritize speed and when to invest in foundational work



  





 Why Epiminds
 


* We’re transforming manual marketing into an intelligent, self-evolving system. The next era won’t rely on manual execution, it will be orchestrated by autonomous AI teams that learn, create, and strategize with superhuman precision, speed, and imagination.
* We’re a small, high-ownership team from Spotify, Google, and Kry, backed by investors behind Anthropic, xAI and Mistral. We’re here to change the world-not someday, but now. The systems we build will redefine how ideas are created, how decisions are made, and how marketing itself evolves. If you want to help rewrite that future, this is where it begins.

title: Junior Software Engineer (framtida CTO), endast equity
description:
Spyrely söker en Junior Software Engineer (framtida CTO)/ Co-Founder – deltid, endast equity
   

  

 Är du en ambitiös utvecklare som vill vara med från början och bygga något på riktigt? Vill du växa in i en CTO-roll och samtidigt vara med och forma ett techbolag i tidigt skede?
   

  

 Spyrely är en early-stage startup som automatiserar konkurrentbevakning för små och medelstora företag. Vi hjälper bolag att följa sina konkurrenters nyheter, kampanjer, produktlanseringar och rekryteringar – enkelt, automatiskt och datadrivet.
   

  

 Nu söker vi en Junior Software Engineer – en smart, driven person som är i slutet av sina studier eller har 1–3 års erfarenhet, och som vill bygga något från grunden tillsammans med oss.
   

  

 Vem du är:
   

 – Sista året civilingenjörstudent, PhD student eller har 1–3 års relevant erfarenhet
   

 – Gärna teknisk utbildning (t.ex. datateknik, IT, teknisk fysik eller motsvarande)
   

 – Du har byggt egna projekt eller varit del i mindre utvecklingsteam
   

 – Du gillar produktutveckling, problemlösning och att ta ansvar
   

 – Du vill arbeta nära affären och påverka både teknik och strategi
   

 – Du har ambitionen att växa in i en CTO-roll över tid
   

  

 Vad du kommer göra:
   

 – Vidareutveckla vår första version av plattformen
   

 – Utforska och välja rätt teknisk infrastruktur för framtiden
   

 – Samarbeta med grundarna för att prioritera rätt features och bygga MVP:er
   

 – Lägga grunden för ett techteam och leda utvecklingen på sikt
   

  

 Vad vi erbjuder:
   

 – En medgrundarroll med equity – du blir delägare
   

 – En plats vid beslutsbordet – du påverkar hela bolagets utveckling
   

 – En tydlig väg till CTO-roll och möjlighet att bygga ett team runt dig
   

 – Flexibla arbetstider, deltid och remote-vänligt
   

 – Möjlighet att bygga något meningsfullt i en tydlig marknad med konkret behov
   

  

 Varför Spyrely?
   

 Konkurrentbevakning är idag manuellt, dyrt och ineffektivt. Spyrely gör det automatiserat, strukturerat och tillgängligt – något många bolag behöver, men få löser bra idag. Vi bygger för verkliga användare och riktiga behov.

title: Ada-utvecklare
description:
Vi har nu ett nytt behov och söker därför en konsultkollega med nedan kvalifikationer. Tjänsten är en del av vår konsultverksamhet vilket innebär att du blir anställd av oss och arbetar hos kund alt. interna projekt och åtaganden.
   

  

**Jobbeskrivning**
* Utveckla och underhålla mjukvara i Ada
* Designa och implementera effektiva algoritmer för avancerade problem
* Arbeta nära systemingenjörer och domänexperter
* Bidra till arkitektur- och designbeslut
* Testa, verifiera och dokumentera din kod enligt höga kvalitetskrav


**Din profil (Skall krav)**
* Erfarenhet av programmering i Ada
* Mycket god förståelse för algoritmer, datastrukturer och matematiskt tänkande
* Civilingenjörsutbildning eller motsvarande erfarenhet inom t.ex. datateknik, teknisk fysik eller matematik
* Erfarenhet av arbete i tekniskt komplexa miljöer (t.ex. försvar, flyg, industri, säkerhetskritiska system) är meriterande
* God förmåga att arbeta både självständigt och i team
* Flytande svenska i tal och skrift


**Sista ansökningdatum:** 
 20-10-2025
   

  

**Om Oss**
 Att jobba på Deploja är något helt annat än att arbeta på ett vanligt konsultbolag – och det är vi riktigt stolta över. Vad är det då som gör oss unika?
   

  

 Vi erbjuder helt enkelt mer än bara hög lön och större frihet, det är bara början. Hos oss hittar du den arbetsmiljö och de möjligheter du förtjänar. Här påverkar du din egen lön som helt och hållet som baseras på ditt timpris mot kund.
   

  

 Vår lönemodell är en hybridlösning mellan en fast månadslön och en provisionsbaserad ersättning. Det innebär att din månadslön baseras på ditt timpris, fast om du mot förmodan skulle stå utan uppdrag så behåller du en grund lön fram tills vi hittat ett nytt uppdrag, bra va?
   

  

**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**
 🚀 Spännande uppdrag hos våra många kunder. Vi fokuserar på långsiktiga uppdrag, vilket ger dig möjlighet att skapa värde för kunden samtidigt som du utvecklas själv.
   

  

 🌟 En trygg månadslön – tillsammans bestämmer vi en grundlön baserad på dina uppdrag.
   

  

 🚗 Tjänstebil – vi uppmuntrar dig att välja en elbil för en mer hållbar framtid.
   

  

 💼 Tjänstepension och stora möjligheter till löneväxling.
   

  

 🌴 Semester - Önskar du mer än 30 dagar semester, kanske 60 dagar?
   

  

 🏥 Privat sjukvårdsförsäkring, olycksfallsförsäkring och livförsäkring för ökad trygghet.
   

  

 📚 Kompetensutveckling – du får själv sätta din budget och välja vilka utbildningar du vill delta i.
   

  

 🕑 Livskvalitet - Har du kanske svårt att få ihop pusslet i vardagen och önskar arbeta lite mindre och ändå kunna tjäna lika mycket om inte mer?
   

  

* Vi hanterar ansökningar löpande, med hänsyn till höga arbetstrycket är det extra viktigt med en kort motivering för tjänsten som förklarar hur man möter kraven.

title: Full Stack Developer för Start Up i Stockholm
description:
🚀 Fullstack Developer – Shape the Future of HR Tech (Stockholm, On-site)
 



  





 Are you a hands-on builder who loves creating fast, scalable web platforms from the ground up?
 



 Join a rapidly growing HR tech startup that’s transforming how companies hire — connecting businesses with top recruiters across Europe.
 



  





 We’re looking for a
 **Fullstack Developer** 
 who combines technical excellence with product intuition.
 



  





 If you thrive in fast-paced environments, enjoy solving real user problems, and want to see your work have an immediate impact — this is your next challenge.
 



  





 💻 What You’ll Do
 


* Lead end-to-end development of a web-based SaaS platform used by hundreds of recruiters and companies
* Build and scale backend systems with
 **Node.js, Supabase, and PostgreSQL**
* Develop clean, performant frontends with
 **Next.js, TypeScript, and tRPC**
* Work closely with design and product to deliver seamless user experiences
* Optimize performance, data architecture, and platform reliability



  





 🧠 What You Bring
 


* 5+ years of fullstack or product development experience
* Strong skills in
 **TypeScript, Node.js, Next.js, tRPC, Supabase, PostgreSQL, and Vercel**
* Deep backend knowledge (API design, scalability, performance tuning)
* Product-driven mindset and understanding of UX principles
* A collaborative, proactive approach — you take ownership and deliver



*Bonus points if you’ve worked with HR tech, marketplaces, or recruitment platforms.* 




  





 🌍 Why Join
 


* Be part of a
 **fast-scaling Nordic HR tech platform** 
 with rapid European expansion
* Work
 **on-site in central Stockholm** 
 with a small, passionate founding team
* Influence product direction and architecture from day one
* Competitive compensation package + potential equity



  





 If you’re ready to build something impactful — and want to join a team where every line of code drives growth — we’d love to meet you.
 



  





 👉
 **Apply now** 
 and help shape the future of HR tech.

title: System Developer
description:
We now have a new requirement and are looking for a consultant colleague with the qualifications listed below. The position is part of our consulting business, which means you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments.
   

  

*As part of your application, you may be presented to clients/partners as part of the recruitment process. If selected for the assignment, you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments as part of our consulting business.*
**Your Profile (Must-have Requirements)**
* An IT background, theoretical or just through mere interest and practice
* Data Center management, formal handling of networks and applications
* Familiar with Oss such as LINUX and/or Windows
* Practice in automation (Scripting, ANSIBLE or similar)
* Fluent in Swedish and English, in speech and writing


**Application deadline:** 
 17-10-2025
   

  

**About Us**
 We currently employ experienced consultants in areas such as System Development, AI, Machine Learning, Testing, Cloud, Infra DevOps, and IT Project Management.
   

  

 Working at Deploja is something entirely different from working at an ordinary consulting company—and we are really proud of that. So, what makes us unique?
   

  

 We simply offer more than just a high salary and greater freedom; that’s just the beginning. With us, you’ll find the work environment and opportunities you deserve. Welcome to Deploja, where the grass is indeed greener!
   

  

**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**
 🚀 Exciting assignments with our many clients. We focus on long-term projects, which gives you the opportunity to create value for the client while also developing yourself.
   

  

 🌟 A secure monthly salary – together we’ll agree on a base salary depending on your assignments.
   

  

 🚗 Company car – we encourage you to choose an electric car for a more sustainable future.
   

  

 💼 Occupational pension and great opportunities for salary conversion.
   

  

 🌴 Vacation – Would you like more than 30 days of vacation, perhaps 60 days?
   

  

 🏥 Private health insurance, accident insurance, and life insurance for increased security.
   

  

 📚 Skills development – you set your own budget and choose the training you wish to attend.
   

  

 🕑 Quality of life – Are you struggling to balance everyday life and wish to work a little less while still earning as much, if not more?
   

  

*We handle applications continuously, and due to the high workload, it's especially important to include a short motivation for the position, explaining how you meet the requirements.*

title: Senior Fullstack Developer
description:
**Bli en del av Sveriges snabbast växande techbolag**
 Vi har vuxit från idé till närmare 200 konsulter på bara fyra år – för att vi kombinerar teknisk spets med äkta samarbetskultur. Vi tror på frihet med ansvar, på entreprenörsdriv i vardagen, och på att teknik blir som bäst när människor får utrymme att påverka. Och det fungerar. Förra året blev TechSeed Sveriges snabbast växande konsultbolag – och nu siktar vi på 400 medarbetare nästa år.
   

  

 TechSeed är inte ett vanligt konsultbolag. Vi bygger banbrytande, uppkopplade lösningar från grunden, med teknik som sträcker sig över FPGA, IoT, Edge Computing, Cyber Security, AI och XR. Vi skapar lösningar som inte bara är ligger i teknisk framkant - utan är användardrivna, hållbara och verkligt värdeskapande.
   

  

 Nu söker vi en
 **senior fullstackutvecklare** 
 som vill vara med i ett passionerat och innovativt team. Du har stark kompetens inom både front- och backend, och ett intresse för framtidens teknologier – gärna även XR. Här får du arbeta nära erfarna utvecklare, designers och tekniska projektledare i uppdrag som gör skillnad.
   

  

**Vad du får hos TechSeed**
* Möjlighet att påverka – både projekt, team och TechSeeds framtid
* En inkluderande och lärande kultur där varje perspektiv räknas
* Flexibilitet och självständighet i vardagen
* Bonus- och delägarprogram som låter dig ta del av framgången
* Möjligheten att växa inom områden som matchar dina ambitioner – från teknik till ledarskap


**Vi söker dig som har**
* Gedigen erfarenhet av front-end (React, Angular, HTML/CSS/JS)
* Erfarenhet av back-end-utveckling (Node.js, .NET, Python)
* Kunskap om databaser (MySQL, MongoDB, SQL Server)
* Van att jobba med molntjänster (AWS, Azure, GCP)
* Analytisk förmåga och driv att lösa komplexa problem
* Flytande svenska och engelska
* Bonus: erfarenhet av XR (Unity, Unreal), samt konsultroll eller scale-up-miljö


**Vill du vara med på vår resa och skapa framtidens uppkopplade lösningar tillsammans med oss?** 
 Eller kanske bara nyfiken på att veta mer? Hör av dig redan idag – vi ser fram emot att prata med dig!

title: Senior Frontend developer
description:
**HAYPP GROUP**
 We address one of the world’s biggest problems – how to end smoking. There are 1,1 billion smokers in the world. Around 8 million people die every year from smoking-related diseases. Our goal is to significantly reduce death rates, save lives and inspire people to choose healthier enjoyment. How? By offering people safer nicotine online.
   

  

 Haypp Group is one of the Nordics’ leading e-commerce groups with ten store brands, present in seven countries where we serve more than 1 million active consumers. Through brands such as Snusbolaget.se, Northerner.com, Nicokick.com etc., we sell nicotine pouches, Swedish style snus online as well as disposable vapes. With our headquarters located on Östgötagatan in Stockholm we are 250 team members mainly but not exclusively based in Sweden. Also, we are an innovative and fast-moving company that is growing rapidly, driving sustainable business and are changing the world in the process. We are currently on an exciting expansion journey, converting more and more smokers to healthier alternatives across all our markets globally.
   

  

**THE ROLE**
 We are looking for a Frontend Developer with 5
 **+** 
 years of experience to join one of our product teams with a focus on customer facing features. As part of our journey toward innovation and scaling, you’ll play an important role in building and optimizing the technical platform that drives our business.
   

  

 This is an exciting opportunity for a driven and collaborative developer who thrives in a fast-paced environment. You will contribute to developing and maintaining features for our e-commerce platform while growing your technical skills alongside experienced colleagues.
   

  

 We're highly focused on SEO, performance, and accessibility. Our frontend technologies are based on server side rendered razor views with functionality added through imperative TypeScript code.
   

  

 As part of our tech organization, you’ll step into a product team that thrives on collaboration and open dialogue. We foster a culture of curiosity and knowledge sharing, where every idea is valued and has the potential to shape the future.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Develop, implement, and maintain features for our e-commerce platform.
* Collaborate with the team and stakeholders to deliver quality solutions aligned with business needs.
* Contribute to platform optimization and performance improvements.
* Participate in team discussions and contribute innovative ideas for technical solutions.
* Embrace challenges, engage in continuous learning, and grow as a developer.


**What We Want From You**
 We want you to succeed and thrive within this role and our team. Here’s what we’re looking for:
   

  

 5+ years of professional experience in frontend development and familiar with backend technologies.
   

  

 Proficiency in JavaScript, TypeScript, and modern frontend, and experience building modern frontend web solutions.
   

  

 Hands-on experience with SASS or LESS, and tools like Webpack.
   

  

 Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to work both independently and collaboratively.
   

  

 Excellent communication skills, with the ability to work effectively with technical and non-technical team members.
   

  

 Fluency in English, which is the working language at Haypp Group.
   

  

**Bonus Skills That Make You Stand Out**
* Previous experience with .NET Core.
* Experience working with B2C e-commerce platforms or other consumer-facing applications.
* Knowledge of cloud services or DevOps practices.
* A willingness to take on new challenges and grow your technical expertise.


**What We Offer**
 We are a value driven company with our values
 *We team up* 
 ,
 *Innovation Drives Us* 
 ,
 *No Douchebags* 
 and
 *Going the Extra Mile* 
 at the heartbeat of everything that we do. With us you can always expect to get help from people who want to achieve things together and to be able to speak your mind in every social constellation you are part of. We highly value all ideas no matter where they come from, and we are not afraid to try new things out. We are also welcoming, inclusive and everyone at Haypp Group has a voice. In addition, we seize opportunities by putting in hands-on, hard work and celebrating when we reach our goals. With us, you should always feel safe, appreciated and valued but at the same time challenged and excited.
   

  

**Benefits**
 Because we recognize that our team members are our most important differentiator, we offer our team members generous benefits. We offer the following perks to everyone at Haypp Group:
   

  

* Premium ITP1 occupational pension savings plan
* Insurance plan, including private healthcare
* 30 days of paid vacation
* Parental pay lift
* Wellness allowance of 5,000 SEK per year
* Lots of social happenings


**SEND US YOUR APPLICATION TODAY!**
 If this sounds like a place where you would want to contribute and grow, let us know you’re interested by submitting your application! Apply with your CV, a cover letter, through Linkedin or in any other way you feel represents you in the clearest possible way. All ways of connecting work for us!
   

  

 Haypp Group is committed to equality and diversity, and we welcome applications from all qualified individuals regardless of ethnicity, religion, age, gender, sexual orientation, disability, and marital status. We want to offer you great recruitment experience, and if there is anything we can do to make you more comfortable in the process with us, please let us know.
   

  

 If you have any questions about the role or what it’s like to work at Haypp Group in general, feel free to reach out to our responsible recruiter Lea Sjösten at lea.sjosten@hayppgroup.com. We look forward to hearing from you!
   

  

 The Haypp Group is spearheading the global transformation from smoking to healthier product alternatives. With origins in Scandinavia our extensive experience from pioneering markets in smoke free alternatives, as well as being a leader in the e-commerce sector, we now fully bring our vision to a global scale.
   

  

 With ten e-commerce brands, the Haypp Group is present in seven countries where we serve more than 1 100 000 consumers.

title: Java/kotlin developer
description:
We’re currently looking for a Senior Software Developer (consultant) to join our Digital HR team. The consultant will be part of a cross-functional digital team that ensures our HR function has the modern digital capabilities needed to power a cutting-edge steel plant.The assignment involves taking a leading role in shaping the digital backbone of our HR domains. The consultant will act as scrum master/agile servant to the team, as well as design and build highly decoupled microservices, APIs, and solution architectures. Collaboration with HR and Finance stakeholders will be key — translating business needs into technical solutions that deliver tangible value, while ensuring that data flows across the organization are correct, reliable, and scalable. Previous work maintaining and facilitating prioritization of a development team's backlog is highly meriting.
   

  

**Typical responsibilities include:**
* Designing, developing, and operating fast, scalable, and reliable backend services
* Building infrastructure, deployment pipelines, and development tools for efficient delivery
* Guiding the team in agile ways of working, accountable for activities such as sprint planning, refinements, retro etc
* Collaborating with HR and Finance stakeholders to translate needs into solid technical solutions
* Providing technical leadership in solution architecture, microservice design, APIs, and data flows
* Mentoring and supporting the team to foster collaboration, learning, and continuous improvement


**Profile and experience:**
* Strong background in backend development (Java, Kotlin, or similar)
* Solid understanding of microservice and API design, data integration, and event-driven architecture
* Familiarity with modern DevOps practices (CI/CD, automated testing, Kubernetes, Terraform)
* Experience leading teams or acting as Scrum Master / Tech Lead
* Excellent communication skills and ability to work across both technical and business domains
* Degree in Computer Science, Data Science, or equivalent practical experience


**Personal qualities:**
 We’re looking for someone who is solution-oriented, structured, and thrives in dynamic environments. You combine strong technical expertise with curiosity and a growth mindset, and you’re motivated by connecting technology to real business value.
   

  

 Assignment details:
   

  

**Start:** 
 Early November or ASAP
   

  

**End** 
 : 2026-06-30
   

  

**Location:** 
 Stockholm office 2-3 days per week

title: Fullstack Engineer - Commercial Tech
description:
As a Fullstack Engineer at Embark, you will be a Gamemaker in a technical team that builds and maintains internal tools that empower our game teams and improve the studio’s efficiency. Your role will directly support game development by creating solutions that automates and streamlines workflows, and provides valuable analytics. You will also be contributing to commercial projects like tools for monetization and customer support.
   

  

 The team’s goal is to deliver scalable, user-friendly, and cost-efficient solutions that help our teams create dynamic and engaging player experiences. You’ll collaborate closely with game teams, data teams, and the commercial team, reporting to the Tech Lead in Commercial Tech.
   

  

 As an integral part of a creative and autonomous team, you’ll contribute to high-quality tools and systems for both developers and players. For the frontend we use technologies like React, TypeScript and NextJS. For the backend we use Go, protobuf, Python, and OpenAPI.
   

  

**Example Of Responsibilities**
* Develop and improve internal tools for game teams and studio-wide use.
* Automate workflows to reduce manual effort and enhance efficiency.
* Build personalized store recommendation systems and tools.
* Continuously refine engineering practices to ensure services are easy to deploy, scale, and maintain.
* Collaborate with multiple teams to deliver tools and solutions that improve both developer and player experiences.


**We would love if you have**
* A creative and curious mind
* Solid experience with React, TypeScript, NextJS, Go, Python and the GCP stack.
* Proven ability to build internal data-driven tools and services.
* Experience deploying and maintaining services on cloud infrastructure.
* Strong background in analytics and data-driven tooling.
* Analytical mindset, self-driven and capable of taking projects from idea to implementation.
* Experience in the gaming industry or other consumer-facing products.
* Passion for games, interactive experiences and new technologies.
* Professional English communication skills.


 At Embark we offer competitive salaries, passionate colleagues to share knowledge with and much more, but most of all we invite you to take part of a journey into the unknown, to build creative, surprising and beautiful experiences together.
   

  

 We welcome game makers of all sex, class, colour, age, gender identity, education, religion, opinion, culture, nation of origin, language, sexual orientation, shape, size, and ability.
   

  

 Did we leave anyone out? Well, we welcome you, too! We think that the gaming industry is made better when everyone has a seat at the table.
   

  

 Be yourself at Embark and make games while doing so. Please apply with confidence. We can’t wait to hear from you (in English)!

title: Backend Developer (Java)
description:
At Ubiquiti Inc., we create technology platforms for Businesses, Smart Homes, and Internet Service Providers, driven by our goal to connect everyone, everywhere. To date, Ubiquiti has shipped over 100 million devices worldwide, from ISP networking products to next generation of IT solutions. Our growth is made possible by the dedicated team of hundreds behind the scenes. From software developers and product managers to designers and strategists, Team UI is driven to achieve our common goal: Rethinking IT. At Ubiquiti, you’ll heighten your potential and broaden your horizons - all while shaping the future of connectivity.
   

  

**Join forces with us on our mission to build a better IT industry. We are currently looking for a highly skilled Backend Developer (Java) to our team in Stockholm, Sweden.**
***Please note that applicants must live in Sweden and hold a valid work permit at the time of application to be considered for this role.***
**Product & Team**
 UniFi Network. The application is at the core of the UniFi eco-system and has a global audience of customers/users ranging from smart homes, SMB, and Enterprises. You will be working as a part of a distributed team using technologies such as Java 17, Spring, MongoDB, GraphQL, Gradle, and Ant.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Develop efficient, scalable, and maintainable backend services
* Develop integrations with network device firmware and other applications
* Integrate feature designs with larger software systems
* Co-work with cloud architects, backend developers, frontend developers, designers, and other stakeholders


**Requirements**
* 5+ years developing Java applications
* REST API development to support web & mobile applications
* Good understanding of SOLID principles
* Experience with Git/GitHub
* You take ownership of your tasks, you can work independently and you strive to write clean code
* Excellent communication skills and highly proficient in English (written and spoken)


**Nice To Have**
* Knowledge of Bash and Unix
* Spring or other web framework knowledge
* Experience developing AWS cloud services / DevOps
* Good understanding of networking protocols and architectures
* Familiarity with the agile software development processes


**Benefits**
* International work environment
* Competitive compensation package including wellness allowance, occupational pension, medical insurance, private health insurance, life insurance and work-injury insurance
* Five weeks of holiday per year
* Flexible work hours and hybrid work model
* Modern office space located in Epicenter (Hötorget)
* Access to all the latest Ubiquiti products and prototypes for home use and tests


***Please note that a background check will be conducted in the final stage of the recruitment process***

title: Senior embedded-utvecklare
description:
We now have a new requirement and are looking for a consultant colleague with the qualifications listed below. The position is part of our consulting business, which means you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments.
   

  

*As part of your application, you may be presented to clients/partners as part of the recruitment process. If selected for the assignment, you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments as part of our consulting business.*
**Your Profile (Must-have Requirements)**
* At least 5+ years of experience as a software developer in Linux development environments
* Minimum Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or another relevant IT-related specialization


* Solid knowledge of Embedded Linux systems, low-level software (drivers, BSP), open source, and Yocto, with proven hands-on experience
* Strong experience with shell scripts, C, C++, Bash, and Python
* Strong understanding of software design, specifications, and requirements for software components
* Strong interest in and understanding of software test automation
* Solid understanding of embedded hardware schematics and concepts
* Solid understanding of network connectivity, security solutions, encryption, and firewalls
* Experience with source control systems (Git, GitLab, or GitHub)
* Presence at the office in Solna approximately four out of five days per week
* Goal-oriented and cooperative team player
* Excellent English communication skills, both written and verbal


**Meritorious**
* Experience building Continuous Integration systems
* Knowledge of Robot Framework
* Experience with SBOM handling
* Knowledge of embedded systems hardware architecture
* Practical experience with SCRUM and agile methods
* Knowledge of IEC 62304 (Medical device software – Software life cycle processes)
* Previous experience in medtech or similar regulated industry


**Application deadline:** 
 20-10-2025
   

  

**About Us**
 We currently employ experienced consultants in areas such as System Development, AI, Machine Learning, Testing, Cloud, Infra DevOps, and IT Project Management.
   

  

 Working at Deploja is something entirely different from working at an ordinary consulting company—and we are really proud of that. So, what makes us unique?
   

  

 We simply offer more than just a high salary and greater freedom; that’s just the beginning. With us, you’ll find the work environment and opportunities you deserve. Welcome to Deploja, where the grass is indeed greener!
   

  

**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**
 🚀 Exciting assignments with our many clients. We focus on long-term projects, which gives you the opportunity to create value for the client while also developing yourself.
   

  

 🌟 A secure monthly salary – together we’ll agree on a base salary depending on your assignments.
   

  

 🚗 Company car – we encourage you to choose an electric car for a more sustainable future.
   

  

 💼 Occupational pension and great opportunities for salary conversion.
   

  

 🌴 Vacation – Would you like more than 30 days of vacation, perhaps 60 days?
   

  

 🏥 Private health insurance, accident insurance, and life insurance for increased security.
   

  

 📚 Skills development – you set your own budget and choose the training you wish to attend.
   

  

 🕑 Quality of life – Are you struggling to balance everyday life and wish to work a little less while still earning as much, if not more?
   

  

*We handle applications continuously, and due to the high workload, it's especially important to include a short motivation for the position, explaining how you meet the requirements.*

title: Senior Java developer
description:
**Är du en erfaren Javautvecklare som söker nya utmaningar?**
 Hos B3 Innovation får du möjligheten att arbeta i en miljö där innovation och samarbete står i fokus. Vi söker dig med djup kunskap inom Java och som trivs i en dynamisk och inkluderande arbetsmiljö.
   

  

**Om rollen som Javautvecklare på B3 Innovation**
 Som utvecklare hos oss kommer du att:
   

  

* Utveckla högkvalitativa och skalbara lösningar.
* Samarbeta med ett tvärfunktionellt team av experter.
* Delta i design och arkitektur av nya system.


**Om dig**
 Vi söker dig som har god erfarenhet och arbetat som utvecklare under en längre tid. Du som har hunnit både göra misstag och även lära av dem. Förhoppningsvis tycker du om att arbeta i team, dela med dig av dina kunskaper och vill fortsätta att lära dig nytt.
   

  

 Våra krav för att du ska passa i denna roll:
   

  

* Du behärskar svenska i tal och skrift.
* Du har minst 5 års erfarenhet av Javautveckling.
* Du har god kunskap att jobba med Java, Kotlin, Spring, Microservices (gärna i CI/CD-miljö)
* Du har god kunskap att jobba med olika ramverk som React, Angular och Vue.
* Du har ett öga för detaljer och brinner för att leverera kvalitativa lösningar.
* Du är bekväm med moderna utvecklingsmetoder som Agile och DevOps.
* Har du dessutom kunskaper inom Techlead blir vi extra glada!


 Varför B3 Innovation?
   

  

* Innovativ Kultur: Vi uppmuntrar kreativitet och nya idéer.
* Inkluderande miljö: Vi värdesätter mångfald och strävar efter en arbetsplats där alla känner sig välkomna.
* Balans och flexibilitet: Flexibilitet är centralt, vilket gör att du kan forma din arbetsdag för att få livspusslet att gå ihop. Vi förstår vikten av balans mellan arbete och fritid och erbjuder därför flexibla arbetstider.
* Gemenskap: Hos oss blir du en del av ett stöttande team som arbetar tillsammans för att nå gemensamma mål. Det handlar inte bara om “jobb jobb jobb” hos oss. Vi anordnar allt från tech-workshops till sociala aktiviteter som stickcaféer, spelkvällar och AW.


**Om B3 Innovation**
 Vi är kända för vårt fokus på innovation och förmåga att leverera värde till våra kunder. Genom att kombinera djup teknisk expertis med en stark förståelse för våra kunders verksamhet, skapar vi lösningar som verkligen gör skillnad. Vår kultur bygger på öppenhet, samarbete och en passion för teknik.
   

  

 Vi prioriterar personlig utveckling och erbjuder verktyg som B3 Academy, TechTalks och "Lunch & Learn" för att du ska kunna växa.
   

  

 Upptäck möjligheterna med B3 Innovation. Som utvecklare får du arbeta inom spännande branscher som media, bank och finans, energi, offentlig sektor, telekom och e-handel. Oavsett om du optimerar TV-sändningar, utvecklar digitala banktjänster eller skapar smarta hem, hjälper vi dig att hitta det perfekta uppdraget som matchar dina intressen.
   

  

 Våra toppbetyg i medarbetarundersökningar visar att nöjda kollegor är kärnan i vår framgång. Är du redo att kliva in i en miljö där utveckling och trivsel går hand i hand?
   

  

 Som sagt, välkommen till B3 Innovation – vi ser fram emot att höra från dig!
   

  

**Är du redo att ta nästa steg?**
 Skicka in din ansökan idag och bli en del av vårt engagerade och innovativa team!
   

  

 Om du är mer nyfiken på oss så kan du läsa mer om oss här: https://www.b3.se/innovation
   

  

 Om du har funderingar så hör gärna av dig till Kenneth Andersson på +46706678050 alternativt mail kenneth.andersson@b3.se

title: Android Developer
description:
Marshall Group is the audio, tech, and design powerhouse uniting musicians and music lovers through genre-breaking innovation. Our flagship brand, Marshall, is uniquely positioned with over 60 years of rock ‘n’ roll attitude on stage, at home, and on the go. Our iconic products are brought to life by a dedicated team of 800 passionate employees and sold in over 90 markets worldwide.
   

  

**Right now,** 
 we need to strengthen our Software team with a Android developer that will be working with our cross-functional teams. The world of audio is changing. Smart speakers and True Wireless headphones are turning audio into a high-tech industry. In the last few years, our products have gone from simple wired devices to connected and complex IoT devices. We are now focusing on evolving our mobile app and the added value it can provide to our users.
   

  

**What you’ll do:**
* Maintain and develop Android mobile apps for the Marshall brands
* Collaborate closely with our UX and Design team to discuss new features and functions.
* Support and participate in testing activities and evaluation of the app.
* Participate in knowledge-sharing sessions to promote new ideas and innovation.
* Teamwork with the other developers to help us brainstorm solutions and make our apps even better for our users.
* Prototyping new ideas to make them come true, both individually and across teams.


**Who we’re looking for:**
 You are an Android developer with a collaborative mindset who cooperates well internally and externally. To succeed in this role, you need to be committed to collaborative problem-solving, and build quality products to create great user experiences together with the UX and design team. We believe you have a great passion for new technologies, trends, and software development. You get excited by the idea of creating an amazing app experience that resonates with people not only on a functional level but also on an emotional level.
   

  

**You probably have the following experiences & skills:**
* + 3 years of proven professional Android app development experience.
* Experience working with Kotlin.
* Proficient in modern android design patterns (for ex. MVVM, dependency injection) and Jetpack components.
* Familiarity with coroutines and Compose, Dagger Hilt and Clean Architecture.
* Good understanding of Firebase & REST etc.
* Hence strong written and spoken English skills are essential.
* Experience with Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) is a plus.


**Our pledge:**
 We thrive to foster an inclusive workplace and we do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, disability, colour, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age or marital status. We firmly believe that Marshall thrives when our employees do, leading to better experiences for our consumers.
   

  

 We encourage applications from all over the world. To enable transitioning from another country for a role at Marshall, we offer re-location support. This support is tailored for each role but always includes visa/work permit application, local authority registration, and home finding service. Don't hesitate to reach out if you have any questions.
   

  

**Does this sound like you?**
 We look forward to reviewing your application!

title: SAS Developer
description:
**Role Description** 








 This is a full-time hybrid role for a SAS Developer based in Stockholm with the flexibility to work from home. The SAS Developer will be responsible for statistical programming, managing and analyzing data, and supporting data-driven decision making. Key tasks include developing and maintaining SAS code, performing statistical analyses, and collaborating with cross-functional teams to interpret data and generate reports.
 



  





**Qualifications** 







* Statistical Programming and Programming skills
* Analytical Skills and Data Management expertise
* Proficiency in Statistics
* Excellent problem-solving and critical thinking abilities
* Strong communication and collaboration skills
* Ability to work independently and as part of a team
* Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Statistics, or related field
* Experience in the IT or information security industry is a plus

title: Power BI Lead Developer
company_industry: IT Services and IT Consulting, IT System Custom Software Development, and Software Development
description:
Power BI Developer
 



 Location: Stockholm, Sweden
 



 Duration: 12 Months+
 



  





**PowerBI Lead ideal profile
 
*(core competence needed highlighted in green)***




  





 This person will oversee the Real Estate Analytics Power BI app and other analytical assets, taking ownership of best practices for process setup, access management, report development, and governance. They will guide analytical efforts and collaborate with team members to ensure data-driven insights support key business initiatives.
 


* **Responsibilities** 
 :
* **Holistic Power BI Expertise** 
 : Act as a subject matter expert in Power BI report development, defining best practices for data ingestion, semantic model design, documentation, and DAX optimization.

 Establish and maintain processes for governance, maintenance, and access management of analytical artifacts, including the RE Analytics App.
